Whether or not any more data can be read from this data source.

Specified by:

available

public int available()
The number of doubles that can currently be read from this double data source without blocking. This number can change over time.

Specified by:
available in interface DoubleDataSource
Overrides:

Returns:

readIntoBuffer

protected boolean readIntoBuffer(int minLength)
Attempt to get more data from the input source. If less than this can be read, the possible amount will be read, but canReadMore() will return false afterwards.

Overrides:
readIntoBuffer in class BufferedDoubleDataSource
Parameters:
minLength - the amount of data to get from the input source
Returns:
true if the requested amount could be read, false if none or less data could be read.
